jobDescription: Description: F-35 Variance administrative support is required to load the Major Variance Requests (MVR) data and artifacts into Product Data Manager (PDM) and maintaining the database which tracks variances (both prime and supplier) to closure. Specific corrective actions which must be accomplished to close variances must be monitored and reported. The following tasks will be performed, but not limited to: Load all Supplier Variance Requests (SVRs) and MVRs into PDM.Load all Procurement Contracting Officer Letters (PCOLs) and Contract Mods into PDM associated with approval of SVRs and MVRs. This will require monitoring customer and contract documentation.Send supplier approval emails.Initiate and administer travelled work variances in PDM.Maintain the SVR and MVR database including coordinating projected closure dates, tracking closure activity, and maintaining withholding status. Provide requested reports.Provide support for variance and supplier minor change boards, such as agendas, status, computer support during meetings.Support CSA team by monitoring and status supplier variances to support As-Built records.Require CATIA knowledge to process engineering document conversions for supplier minor change board.Desired Skills: Product Data Manager (PDM)  JSF Data Library (JDL)  Catia Familiarity  Strong Personality BASIC QUALIFICATIONS: Microsoft Office, specifically Microsoft Excel and Access.
